trans-unit.source: Enables or disables privileges in the specified access token

seg-source.mrk: Enables or disables privileges in the specified access token

target.mrk: Enables or disables privileges in the specified access token

trans-unit.source: Parameters
Handle to the access token that contains privileges to be modified

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the access token that contains privileges to be modified

target.mrk: Handle to the access token that contains privileges to be modified

trans-unit.source: If True, the function disables all privileges and ignores the NewState parameter.

seg-source.mrk: If True, the function disables all privileges and ignores the NewState parameter.

target.mrk: If True, the function disables all privileges and ignores the NewState parameter.

trans-unit.source: If False, the function modifies privileges based on the information pointed to by the $pNewState parameter.

seg-source.mrk: If False, the function modifies privileges based on the information pointed to by the $pNewState parameter.

target.mrk: If False, the function modifies privileges based on the information pointed to by the $pNewState parameter.

trans-unit.source: A $tagTOKEN_PRIVILEGES structure or a pointer to it that contains the privilege and it's attributes

seg-source.mrk: A $tagTOKEN_PRIVILEGES structure or a pointer to it that contains the privilege and it's attributes

target.mrk: A $tagTOKEN_PRIVILEGES structure or a pointer to it that contains the privilege and it's attributes

trans-unit.source: Size, in bytes, of the buffer pointed to by $pNewState

seg-source.mrk: Size, in bytes, of the buffer pointed to by $pNewState

target.mrk: Size, in bytes, of the buffer pointed to by $pNewState

trans-unit.source: [optional] A $tagTOKEN_PRIVILEGES structure or a pointer to it that specifies the previous state of the privilege that the function modified. This can be 0.

seg-source.mrk: A $tagTOKEN_PRIVILEGES structure or a pointer to it that specifies the previous state of the privilege that the function modified.

target.mrk: A $tagTOKEN_PRIVILEGES structure or a pointer to it that specifies the previous state of the privilege that the function modified.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Pointer to a variable that receives the required size, in bytes, of the buffer pointed to by $tPrevState.

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to a variable that receives the required size, in bytes, of the buffer pointed to by $tPrevState.

target.mrk: Pointer to a variable that receives the required size, in bytes, of the buffer pointed to by $tPrevState.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be 0 if $tPrevState is 0.

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be 0 if $tPrevState is 0.

target.mrk: This parameter can be 0 if $tPrevState is 0.

trans-unit.source: Return Value
True.
False.
Remarks
This function cannot add new privileges to an access token. It can only enable or disable the token's existing privileges.

seg-source.mrk: This function cannot add new privileges to an access token.
It can only enable or disable the token's existing privileges.

target.mrk: This function cannot add new privileges to an access token.
It can only enable or disable the token's existing privileges.

trans-unit.source: Related
$tagTOKEN_PRIVILEGES
See Also
Search AdjustTokenPrivileges in MSDN Library.
Example
for this example to have sense

seg-source.mrk: for this example to have sense

target.mrk: for this example to have sense

trans-unit.source: $hToken is this process' token with $TOKEN_ALL_ACCESS access

seg-source.mrk: $hToken is this process' token with $TOKEN_ALL_ACCESS access

target.mrk: $hToken is this process' token with $TOKEN_ALL_ACCESS access

trans-unit.source: Disable all privileges for this token

seg-source.mrk: Disable all privileges for this token

target.mrk: Disable all privileges for this token

trans-unit.source: ... Do whatever with this token now and here...

seg-source.mrk: Do whatever with this token now and here...

target.mrk: Do whatever with this token now and here...

trans-unit.source: TokenPrivileges
All TokenPrivileges disabled!
Close handle when done
